A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Disappointing sequel. 
Spoiled characters and wasted opportunity\, almost throwing away the best characters. 
mark hamill said in interviews he was not happy with the direction luke took\, and I'm not surprised. The last jedi is two fingers up to the loyalist fans of the originals. Finns whole arc in this is pointless other than to set up a battle and preach animal welfare\, Snokes character development must have been left for a book as there is no back story here. 
Also nowhere else to take these characters after this. Good luck J.J. Abrams.
